verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:20
verses.text: And the rest of the sons of Levi were these: Of the sons of Amram; Shubael: of the sons of Shubael; Jehdeiah.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:21
verses.text: Concerning Rehabiah: of the sons of Rehabiah, the first was Isshiah.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:22
verses.text: Of the Izharites; Shelomoth: of the sons of Shelomoth; Jahath.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:23
verses.text: And the sons of Hebron; Jeriah the first, Amariah the second, Jahaziel the third, Jekameam the fourth.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:24
verses.text: Of the sons of Uzziel; Michah: of the sons of Michah; Shamir.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:25
verses.text: The brother of Michah was Isshiah: of the sons of Isshiah; Zechariah.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:26
verses.text: The sons of Merari were Mahli and Mushi: the sons of Jaaziah; Beno.
